Authors: Rodríguez-Hermosa, J. I.; Codina-Cazador, A.; Ruiz, B.; Sirvent, J. M.; Roig, J.; Farrés, R.
Title: Management Of Foreign Bodies In The Rectum
Publication Title: Colorectal Disease : The Official Journal Of The Association Of Coloproctology Of Great Britain And Ireland
Comments: Intentionally ingested in 6 cases. Includes swallowed nails, keys, spanners, batteries in population of prisoners and intoxicated people.

Authors: Naji, Hussein; Isacson, Daniel; Svensson, Jan F.; Wester, Tomas
Title: Bowel Injuries Caused By Ingestion Of Multiple Magnets In Children: A Growing Hazard
Comments: 12 year old potentially intentional ingestion whilst playing a game with her brother.

Authors: Norton-Gregory, Ashley A.; Kulkarni, Naveen M.; O'Connor, Stacy D.; Budovec, Joseph J.; Zorn, Adam P.; Desouches, Stephane L.
Title: Gastrointestinal System Foreign Bodies.
Comments: Single centre, retrospective database study. Includes intentional ingestion, but data on these not easy to find.
